data.name: Abyss Fantasia
data.detailed_description:
About this game

"Abyss Wonderland" is a role-playing adventure game. Players play the role of the "missing" girl, Yugali, to explore the abyss.

Abyss

Abyss - A huge pit on the continent.
It is bottomless, mysterious and dark, and those who enter it will be affected by the abyss.
Everyone's emotions were extended.
The weak-willed, gradually lose their minds, lose their humanity, and eventually become weird.
But all kinds of precious materials and treasures in the abyss make all explorers enter the abyss one after another.


Explore

Act on the big map of the abyss.
Every scene in the abyss wonderland is carefully drawn by hand, strange and unique.
In the process of exploring the abyss, you will continue to meet new characters and creatures, and enjoy the strange sights below the abyss.
Use various abilities and cards to reveal the secrets hidden in the scene.

Return to the city to rest before losing your mind,
Feel the customs of "Cynthia", the city on the edge of the abyss.

Wonder

The explorers under the abyss were transformed by their strong obsessions during their lifetimes.
There is a touching story behind every wonder.

Time picture book

A strange thing that can record everything.
All things, abilities, and feelings are turned into cards.
The environment and characters can be changed by manipulating these cards.

Story

A story about everyone under the abyss.
Every story has multiple endings, it's all up to you.
You can change others by placing cards, thereby affecting the development of the plot.
Or use some unexpected cards to achieve a certain purpose.

The ever-changing battle

In the abyss exploration, you will encounter many strange and powerful monsters.
You can fight with cards.

Using different cards may have unexpected effects when dealing with enemies.



· Interaction between cards and states


· The interaction between cards and the environment

In addition, the same card will change under various factors, and use these cards flexibly.
Rich imagination will be the key to your victory.

Player community


Discord Player Community : https://discord.gg/ehpEy7hhh5

I hope the games we make can bring you unlimited surprises.

data.short_description: In the city of Cynthia, the young girl Yugali, in order to find her lost past, steps into the abyss at the edge of the city. Along the way, she will experience complex and treacherous emotions, encounter various strange creatures, and finally uncover the deepest secrets of the abyss.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1/10 64-bit (ver.1909 and above)
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Maximum resolution: 1920x1080 Monitor capable of 60FPS+ required Supports Keyboard, Mouse and XINPUT gamepads
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1/10 64-bit (ver.1909 and above)
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Maximum resolution: 1920x1080 Monitor capable of 60FPS+ required Supports Keyboard, Mouse and XINPUT gamepads
